"""Assert whether the single plot entry works and returns an ax object.
    """
df = pd.read_csv(data['testcsv.csv'])
df = df[:1]
selection = 'nodes'
label = 'test'
fig = Figure()
FigureCanvas(fig)
ax = fig.add_subplot(111)
plot.plot_line(df=df, selection=selection, label=label, fit=True, ax=ax)
